Mr Eric Schmidt had been brought in to provide greater management experience to Google. He has been in the job for a decade and will become executive chairman. Google said Mr Eric Schmidt would focus on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships . The BBC reports the announcement was made as Google unveiled strong net profits in the last three months of$ US2.54 billion on revenues of$ US8.44 billion. The$ US2.54

back-to-back 3-pointers that gave the Pistons the lead for good and sent them to a 107-102 victory over the Golden State Kobe Bryants on Thursday night. "That really hurt my feelings, that tip," Rasheed Wallace said. You can't let that frustrate you. I missed two point-blank foul shots. I'm upset at myself about that. You can't let that one thing get you down. That's what we did, just dug deep and came up with some stops down the stretch. Richard Hamilton scored 24 points and Allen Iverson added 23 as the Pistons won for the second straight time to open their four-game road tRichard Hamilton after losing their first two games with Allen Iverson . On one hand, this was a polite way of saying, " Allen Iverson 's a crazy person," but the underlying message was, "We have a plan here. Let us stick to it."

"Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed!" "For the last 10 years, we have all been equally involved in making decisions," Eric Schmidt said in a blog post. This triumvirate approach has real benefits in terms of shared wisdom, and we will continue to discuss the big decisions among the three of us. But we have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company.
